97
If you have twins or triplets, you 
are more likely to experience 
postnatal and longer-term 
depression. This is mainly 
because of the additional 
stress of caring for more than 
one baby. Getting out of the 
house	can	be	difficult	and	this	
can make you feel isolated. 
Twins Trust (www.twinstrust.
org) can help you to make 
contact with other mothers 
through local twins clubs and 
through t
